instructions: In a bowl, toss the shrimp, corn, red pepper and onions. In a small bowl, combine the vinegar, oil, basil, lemon juice, sugar, salt and cayenne. Pour over shrimp mixture and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour or until chilled.
ingredients: 1/2 pound cooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
title: Corn and Shrimp Salad
